languages.text: "Я не знал его, но мне кажется, он был достойным человеком. Девиз, звучавший из его уст, указывает, что он контактировал с моим наставником. Я сохранил его кортикальный имплант и поглотил информацию, хранившуюся в нем. Однако большие массивы памяти зашифрованы неизвестным мне кодом".

traits.locale_text: {n}В механизированном голосе слышна скорбная дребезжащая нота.{/n} "Я не знал его, но мне кажется, он был достойным человеком. Я сохранил его кортикальный имплант и поглотил информацию, хранившуюся в нем. Однако большие массивы данных, являвшихся памятью почтенного Авеля, зашифрованы неизвестным мне кодом".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
languages.original_text: "Я не знал его, но мне кажется, он был достойным человеком. Девиз, звучавший из его уст, указывает, что он контактировал с моим наставником. Я сохранил его кортикальный имплант и поглотил информацию, хранившуюся в нем. Однако большие массивы памяти зашифрованы неизвестным мне кодом".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanical voice quivers with tinny grief.{/n} "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data that were reverend Abel's memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanical voice quivers with tinny grief.{/n} "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data that were reverend Abel's memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin ihm nie begegnet, doch ich glaube, er war ein sehr würdiger Mann. Der Satz, der über seine Lippen kam, deutet darauf hin, dass er Kontakt zu meinem Mentor hatte. Ich habe sein kortikales Implantat bewahrt und die darin enthaltenen Informationen absorbiert. Die großen Mengen an Datenerinnerungen sind jedoch mit einem Code verschlüsselt, der mir noch unbekannt ist."
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin ihm nie begegnet, doch ich glaube, er war ein sehr würdiger Mann. Der Satz, der über seine Lippen kam, deutet darauf hin, dass er Kontakt zu meinem Mentor hatte. Ich habe sein kortikales Implantat bewahrt und die darin enthaltenen Informationen absorbiert. Die großen Mengen an Datenerinnerungen sind jedoch mit einem Code verschlüsselt, der mir noch unbekannt ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne l'ai jamais rencontré, mais je crois que c'était une personne de valeur. Ses propos indiquent qu'il était en contact avec mon mentor. J'ai conservé son implant cortical et absorbé les informations qu'il contenait. Cependant, la grande quantité de données mémorielles qu'il renferme sont protégées par un cryptage qui m'est inconnu. »
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne l'ai jamais rencontré, mais je crois que c'était une personne de valeur. Ses propos indiquent qu'il était en contact avec mon mentor. J'ai conservé son implant cortical et absorbé les informations qu'il contenait. Cependant, la grande quantité de données mémorielles qu'il renferme sont protégées par un cryptage qui m'est inconnu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我从来没见过他， 但我认为他是个有价值的人。他说出的那句话表明，他与我的导师曾有过接触。我保存了他的脑皮质植入物，吸收了其中的信息。不过，大量的数据记忆是由某种我并不熟悉的密码进行编码的。”
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没见过他， 但我认为他是个有价值的人。他说出的那句话表明，他与我的导师曾有过接触。我保存了他的脑皮质植入物，吸收了其中的信息。不过，大量的数据记忆是由某种我并不熟悉的密码进行编码的。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼には会ったことはありませんが、価値のある人物だったと思われます。彼の口から出てきた言葉は、我が師と接触していたことを示しています。彼の皮質インプラントを保存し、それに含まれていた情報を取り込みました。ただし、多量のデータメモリは自分にとってまだ不慣れな暗号でエンコードされています」
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: 「彼には会ったことはありませんが、価値のある人物だったと思われます。彼の口から出てきた言葉は、我が師と接触していたことを示しています。彼の皮質インプラントを保存し、それに含まれていた情報を取り込みました。ただし、多量のデータメモリは自分にとってまだ不慣れな暗号でエンコードされています」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Nunca llegué a conocerle, pero creo que fue una persona digna. La frase que emitió por sus labios indica que estaba en contacto con mi mentor. Conservé su implante cortical y absorbí la información que contenía. No obstante, su gran cantidad de memorias de datos está codificada con un cifrado que todavía desconozco».
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca llegué a conocerle, pero creo que fue una persona digna. La frase que emitió por sus labios indica que estaba en contacto con mi mentor. Conservé su implante cortical y absorbí la información que contenía. No obstante, su gran cantidad de memorias de datos está codificada con un cifrado que todavía desconozco».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

languages.text: "Onunla hiç karşılaşmadım ancak değerli bir kişi olduğunu düşünmekteyim. Dudaklarından dökülen sözcükler, yönderimle irtibat hâlinde olduğunu işaret etmekte. Zihinsel implantını sakladım ve barındırdığı bilgiyi absorbe ettim. Büyük miktardaki veri belleği, ne yazık ki aşina olmadığım bir parolayla şifrelenmiş durumda."
languages.original_text: "I never met him, but I think he was a person of worth. The phrase that came from his lips indicates he was in contact with my mentor. I preserved his cortical implant and absorbed the information it contained. However, the large amounts of data-memories are encoded with a cipher yet unfamiliar to me."

traits.locale_text: "Onunla hiç karşılaşmadım ancak değerli bir kişi odluğunu düşünmekteyim. Dudaklarından dökülen sözcükler, yönderimle irtibat hâlinde olduğuna işaret etmekte. Zihinsel implantını sakladım ve barındırdığı bilgiyi absorbe ettim. Büyük miktardaki veri belleği, aşina olmadığım bir parolayla şifrelenmiş durumda ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
